Multi Phasic weapons and shields are used constantly on Voyager in thier ba=
ttles with the Borg.

The Trainer base shook wildly as the multitude of wea=
pons fire struck the shields. The anchors holding it in place rocked and th=
e first of the six snapped. The computer console showed the shield perimete=
r. the bright red glow reflected energy arcs where the shields weakened. Th=
e autoguns aimed skyward taking aim at the location where the weapons fire =
had come from. about a dozen autoguns fired thier pulse cannons toward the =
new ship. "This is not my idea of a good time." he thought as his weapons o=
pened fire. He knew that the ship was more advanced than just about anythin=
g he'd seen, except on one occasion when Prebon led them on a strike on a P=
redacon hanger, Blaze had found some type of warship in the computer progra=
ms that nearly matched the description. She didn't have time to learn more =
about it so he didn't have any more information than that.
  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Sunday, June 03, 2001 5:25 AM
  Subject: Re: ATTACK!


  OOC: =
Me watch star trek? since when? Heh but I did get the multi phase laser 
  =
thingy from an ep or movie I was of star trek... However the photon torpedo=
e 
  thing... everyone knows what they are so I used them. 

  Gemini 1 lau=
ghs as he opens fire on the two he did before with the multi 
  phase laser=
 cannon, however this time the beams did not strike the bots but 
  were st=
opped by the shield. Vile notices this and growls as he turns to 
  everyon=
e. 

  Vile: "It seems as though these people will not submit willingly to =
our help. 
  In that case... open fire on that base with everything!" 

  W=
ith that said all over the ship missile pods rise from within as it turns 
=
  towards the trainers base. Vile smirks as this happens and types in a few=
 
  commands at his console causing the bottom of the ship to open up and a=
 
  massive cannon to lower. Without another word the Violator opens fire o=
n the 
  trainer base with three shots from each megacannon, 6 photon torpe=
does, 8 
  laser blasts, and six concussion missiles. As this happens the t=
ip of the 
  massive cannon that lowered out of the Violator begins to glow=
 and crackle 
  with energy as it begins to charge. 

  Outside the trainer=
s base Cyanide notices the mass of firepower sent at the 
  base and laughs=
 evily to himself as the acid rain begins to stop. 

  Cyanide: "So they're=
 the enemy now..." 

  Cyanide grins as a loud hum is heard from the sky be=
fore four large beams of 
  energized acid are also sent at the trainer bas=
e. 
  IN another time...
